employment.name: Software Developer at Gofore
employment.description: International projects for clients of different sectors with the aim of help them in their digital transformation.

projects.title: Migration (AngularJS - Angular) of a measurement equipment manufacturer platform
projects.description: Leading measurement equipment manufacturer located in Finland provides a cloud based measurement data monitoring system, which allows customers to remotely monitor measurement and alarm information on sites. An update of technologies was required to improve performance and maintainability.
tasks: Analysis, definition and implementation of the strategy to migrate an existing application from AngularJS to Angular 2+
Update of the existing libraries
Performance of code reviews for the software quality assurance
Estimation, implementation and maintenance of new functionalities in the migrated application
Implementation of unit tests

projects.title: Creation of a web editor for a map application
projects.description: An existing application with the goal of provide urban mobility and cross-channel shopping experiences was required to develop a web based editor to allow the customers to add point of interest and contents to their locations.
tasks: Design, set up and implementation of a ReactJS application
Integration of an interative map
Implementation of unit tests
Implementation of functional testing

projects.title: Creation of a Digital Signage Platform
projects.description: Digital content displayed on offices monitors with the aim of display usefull and visually engaging experiences.
tasks: Analysis of the user experience and design of the user interface for different screen scenarios
Set up and implementation of a ReactJS application
Integration with open data exposed in GTFS format
Integration with social media API (Outlook, Twitter and Slack)

employment.name: Consultant at Accenture Banking Technology
employment.description: International projects for different banks with the aim of help them in their digital transformation. With my seniority and experience in different projects, I certificated myself as a trainer of the product that was integrated in the different customers.

projects.title: Digital Transformation of an Insurance Company
projects.description: As part of the multicultural agile team, I lead the digital transformation of one of the largest insurance groups in its core markets of Austria and Central and Eastern Europe.
tasks: Estimation, implementation and maintenance of the web application
Performance of code reviews for the software quality assurance
Migration of the Customer Experience Platform
Involvement in the continues integration process

projects.title: Development of a digital bank application
projects.description: Participation in the digital transformation of an important financial group
tasks: Analysing customer requirements
Improving form-based flows
Estimation of tasks, modeling forms and frontend development

projects.title: Development of a credit card portal
projects.description: International Agile project for a omnichannel credit card portal creation
tasks: Analysing customer requirements
Estimation of tasks and frontend development

projects.title: Development of different projects
projects.description: Development of new features and improvements of the company products as part of the R&D department.
tasks: Development of a MV* architecture
Integration of social networks inside a multichannel platform
Implementation of a workflow engine in a Java application

employment.name: Desarrolladora Frontend en Gofore
employment.description: Realización de proyectos internacionales para clientes de diferentes sectores con el objetivo de ayudar en su transformación digital.

projects.title: Plataforma fabricante de equipos de medición

projects.title: Editor de contenido de una aplicación de mapas
tasks: Implementación de una aplicación ReactJS
Integración con REST API
Intregración con Here Maps
Internalización
Unit testing
Configuración y despliegue de la aplicación en un servidor Apache

projects.title: Aplicación Señalización Digital

Implementación de una aplicación ReactJS
Integración con datos abiertos expuestos en formato GTFS
Integración con APIs sociales como Outlook API, Twitter API y Slack API
Configuración y despliegue de la aplicación

employment.name: Consultor en Accenture Banking Technology
